headline: Colgate-Palmolive faces $200M in tariff costs
summary: The consumer product manufacturer said it expects to pay more for raw materials and finished goods it sources from abroad despite its recent supply chain shifts.

raw.headline: Colgate-Palmolive faces $200M in tariff costs
raw.summary: The consumer product manufacturer said it expects to pay more for raw materials and finished goods it sources from abroad despite its recent supply chain shifts.

headline: Oil prices pare back some earlier losses as OPEC+ hikes production
summary: Investing.com - Oil prices declined on Monday, but pared back some earlier losses, after the OPEC+ oil group signaled over the weekend that it will further increase production in the coming months.

raw.headline: Oil prices pare back some earlier losses as OPEC+ hikes production
raw.summary: Investing.com - Oil prices declined on Monday, but pared back some earlier losses, after the OPEC+ oil group signaled over the weekend that it will further increase production in the coming months.
